statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); git_status=""; if cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null | sed 's/^/@/'); if ! git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || [ -n "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ]; then dirty="*"; else dirty=""; fi; ahead_behind=$(git rev-list --left-right --count HEAD...@{u} 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$ahead_behind" ]; then ahead=$(echo "$ahead_behind" | awk '{print $1}'); behind=$(echo "$ahead_behind" | awk '{print $2}'); if [ "$behind" -gt 0 ] && [ "$ahead" -gt 0 ]; then arrows=":⇣⇡"; elif [ "$behind" -gt 0 ]; then arrows=":⇣"; elif [ "$ahead" -gt 0 ]; then arrows=":⇡"; else arrows=""; fi; else arrows=""; fi; git_status=" ${branch}${dirty}${arrows}"; fi; env_info=""; if [ -n "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" ]; then env_info=" $CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV"; elif [ -n "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ]; then env_info=" $(basename "$VIRTUAL_ENV")"; fi; printf "\033[34m%s\033[0m\033[90m%s\033[0m%s" "$dir" "$git_status" "$env_info"
